mage piyanan wisin eewa yam aya sandaha niyama karana ladde da eewa ayithi owunta ya”yi wadala seka. 24 dasa dena epawath asu wita ee sohoyuran dedena gana ko්pa wu ha. 25 eheth, jesus wahanse owun thaman wetha kandawa mese wadala seka: ”wijathinge aandukarayin owun kere aadhipathyaya pawathwana bawath, owunge pradhanin owun kere balaya pawathwana bawath oba dannahu ya. 26 eheth, oba athara ese nowiya yuthu yi.
honda naraka andunanne na.
